original_text: And as they still went on and talked, behold, chariots of fire and horses of fire separated the two of them. And Elijah went up by a whirlwind into heaven.
korean_text: 두 사람이 길을 가며 말하더니 불수레와 불말들이 두 사람을 갈라놓고 엘리야가 회오리 바람으로 하늘로 올라가더라

sentences.original_text: And as they still went on and talked
behold, chariots of fire and horses of fire
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 불 병거들과 불 말들이 나타나

sentences.original_text: And Elijah went up by a whirlwind into heaven
